question: Which Indian state/UT has launched ‘Mukhya Mantri Ghar Ghar Ration Yojna’?
explanation:
The Delhi Cabinet has approved the doorstep delivery of ration products to eligible beneficiaries across the Union Territory.
As per the Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal, the scheme will be called ‘Mukhya Mantri Ghar Ghar Ration Yojna’. The programme is expected to be functional in the next six to seven months, after completion of tenders and other requirements.
